Title: Exempts qualified military benefits of veterans from inclusion in a resident's adjusted gross income
Summary: Exempts qualified military benefits from inclusion in a resident's adjusted gross income, including any allowance or in-kind benefit other than personal use of a vehicle, received by any former member of the uniformed services of the United States or any dependent of such member by reason of such member's status or service as a member of such uniformed services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting qualified military benefits of veterans from inclusion in a resident's adjusted gross income
